title: NastyWork Club Marketing Promotional Tour, Toronto
description: We’re hosting a conference bringing together critics of techno-feudalism—scholars, journalists, and activists concerned with digital monopolies and algorithmic control. We’re looking for a freelancer to design and run a multi-channel marketing campaign that will highlight the urgency of these discussions and drive registrations. The ideal partner will help us position the event as both intellectually rigorous and culturally relevant.
